oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grand Opera House
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: arts; entertainment; Grand Opera House; music; theater; 1890s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Grand Opera House, located at the southwest corner of Main and Beale. Signs in the windows advertise a production of "In Old Kentucky."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
